abstract: Andrew Braccia, who had been vice president of consumer Web search at the Internet giant Yahoo, has apparently caught the venture capital bug. Mr. Braccia is joining Accel Partners, a Silicon Valley venture capital firm whose investments include the social-networking site Facebook and the mobile ad network AdMob. Accel said Monday that Mr. Braccia will help it look for new investments in consumer Internet and software companies, with a focus on search, digital media and online advertising.
lead_paragraph: Andrew Braccia, who had been vice president of consumer Web search at the Internet giant Yahoo, has apparently caught the venture capital bug. Mr. Braccia is joining Accel Partners, a Silicon Valley venture capital firm whose investments include the social-networking site Facebook and the mobile ad network AdMob. Accel said Monday that Mr. Braccia will help it look for new investments in consumer Internet and software companies, with a focus on search, digital media and online advertising.

headline.main: Yahoo Vice President Jumps to Venture Firm
